Course Tracking Module¶

Here is a little program to register the information about the different internship that you applied for.

register_internship.display_internship_data()[source]¶

Reads and prints all internship data from the CSV file.

register_internship.main()[source]¶
register_internship.write_internship_data(internship_title, date_applied, research_platform, demand_status, group_name)[source]¶

Writes new internship application information to a CSV file. It checks for duplicates based on ‘Internship Title’ and ‘Research Platform’ before adding a new entry.

Parameters:

  • internship_title (str) – The title of the internship.

  • date_applied (str) – The date on which the internship was requested.

  • research_platform (str) – The platform where you find the internship.

  • demand_status (str) – Indicates if the internship was demanded or not.

  • group_name (str) – The name of the internship group.

Returns:

None
